pullrequest.title: export gazebo lib dirs and plugin lib dirs in cmake config

content.raw: I'm not sure why this is needed. Is this for [this issue](#!/osrf/gazebo/issue/779/missing-dependency-export-for-tbb)?
content.html: I'm not sure why this is needed. Is this for this issue?

pullrequest.title: export gazebo lib dirs and plugin lib dirs in cmake config
